alert.note: Alert for Assumption; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 10:21PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. John The Baptist, southern St. James, northwestern Lafourche and east central Assumption Parishes through 1045 PM CDT... At 1021 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Supreme, or near Napoleonville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thibodaux, Napoleonville, Gramercy, Lutcher, Wallace, Supreme, South Vacherie, Chackbay, North Vacherie, Labadieville, Garyville and Edgard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche
